data.lyric:
[ti:hibachi (feat. Kodak Black & 21 Savage) (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch/21 Savage/Kodak Black]
[al:LIVE LIFE FAST (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]hibachi (feat. Kodak Black & 21 Savage) (Explicit) - Roddy Ricch/21 Savage/Kodak Black
[00:00.28]Wheezy outta here
[00:00.69]Roddy Ricch：
[00:00.98]
[00:25.46]What a n***a do you don't ever appreciate
[00:27.78]You give me attitude I just might go cheat today
[00:30.56]It's 2021 so I plan on lead the way
[00:33.10]I been plottin' my in's and out's and n***a gotta put my cheese away
[00:35.62]
[00:36.80]Took a bad b***h to Hibachi in Huaraches
[00:38.77]
[00:39.33]Got too many jewels on my squad f**k a Nazi
[00:42.07]Two hundred fifty cash hit Japan and get some chopsticks
[00:44.84]I've been with lil' man countin' up bands I ain't gotta drop s**t
[00:47.32]
[00:47.91]What's your ETA
[00:49.16]I ain't even eat today
[00:50.39]I know some n***a 'cross the street sell it for a cheaper rate
[00:52.76]
[00:53.38]Still gotta run it up run it up like I don't got s**t
[00:55.54]
[00:56.05]Always say f**k these n***as and these b***hes 'cause they fake
[00:57.91]Kodak Black：
[00:58.78]More money than you lil' boys it ain't no reason for me to hate
[01:01.42]Anybody try my s**t I'm tryna shoot 'em in they face
[01:03.58]
[01:04.09]They know I'm a demon caught somebody 'round the way
[01:06.79]Yeah I pull up speedin' but n***a I ain't tryna race
[01:09.60]Young n***a on the scene I got my Rollie stickin' up
[01:12.37]Everybody with more band they already know we glizzied up
[01:15.07]Shoot past in the county jail rockin' Yves Saint Laurent
[01:17.51]
[01:18.04]F**kin' on a cracker b***h Britney Minaj
[01:19.86]21 Savage：
[01:20.27]
[01:20.96]F**k 'em all we gon' ball
[01:22.38]Stand tall never fall
[01:23.14]
[01:23.66]Bad b***h answer every time I call
[01:25.87]21
[01:26.37]Got my Glock use protection I don't hit her raw
[01:28.48]On God
[01:28.94]Eatin' noodles in the trenches where they break the law
[01:31.14]P***y
[01:31.71]Piss me off I just might cheat I got a bad reflex
[01:33.98]21
[01:34.41]I got tattoos in my face but I like R&B s*x
[01:36.80]21
[01:37.16]Hit a couple flight attendants 'cause I ride big jets
[01:39.32]
[01:40.02]And I still ain't met a b***h that I'll pay to keep yet
[01:42.83]That's deep
[01:43.41]21
[01:43.87]Savage own his masters ain't no shackles on my feet
[01:46.12]Facts
[01:46.51]Know they takin' pictures tryna calculate a G
[01:48.86]Rats
[01:49.33]I got tunnel vision need binoculars to see
[01:51.63]21
[01:52.03]Took her to Hibachi all she wanted was my meat
[01:54.35]Facts
[01:54.80]Gang hit the corner n***a stopped dropped and freeze
[01:57.14]P***y
[01:57.59]VVS diamonds in my ear Christmas Eve
[01:59.95]21
[02:00.40]Your lil' b***h a thot you need a DNA from Steve
[02:02.71]On God
[02:03.10]My brother sellin' P's he say his money grow on trees
[02:04.65]Roddy Ricch：
[02:04.98]What a n***a do you don't ever appreciate
[02:07.62]You give me attitude I just might go cheat today
[02:10.40]It's 2021 so I plan on lead the way
[02:13.00]I been plottin' my in's and out's and n***a gotta put my cheese away
[02:15.47]
[02:16.38]Took a bad b***h to Hibachi in Huaraches
[02:18.79]
[02:22.32]Got too many jewels on my squad f**k a Nazi
[02:24.46]
[02:27.69]Two hundred fifty cash hit Japan and get some chopsticks
[02:30.11]
[02:33.21]I've been with lil' man countin' up bands I ain't gotta drop s**t
data.trans:
[ti:hibachi (feat. Kodak Black & 21 Savage) (Explicit)]
[ar:Roddy Ricch/21 Savage/Kodak Black]
[al:LIVE LIFE FAST (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.28]Wheezy制作
[00:00.69]//
[00:00.98]
[00:25.46]我所做的一切 你根本不会明白
[00:27.78]你对我颐指气使 我今天可能会选择欺骗
[00:30.56]现在是2021年 所以我打算亲身示范 
[00:33.10]我一直精打细算 必须把我的钱存起来 
[00:35.62]
[00:36.80]穿着皮条编织的凉鞋 带着辣妹去吃日式烧烤 
[00:38.77]
[00:39.33]我身边的人都浑身珠光宝气 对那些带着偏见的人嗤之以鼻 
[00:42.07]随身带着两万五千块现金 飞到日本买几双筷子
[00:44.84]我和朋友在一起 数着钞票 我不会主动出击 
[00:47.32]
[00:47.91]你大概什么时候能到
[00:49.16]我今天还没有吃东西
[00:50.39]我知道街对面有几个哥们以低价卖货 
[00:52.76]
[00:53.38]一如既往地奋力拼搏 就像我一无所有似的
[00:55.54]
[00:56.05]总是对那些家伙冷嘲热讽 因为他们虚情假意
[00:57.91]//
[00:58.78]比你们这些家伙更有钱  我没有理由心生嫉妒
[01:01.42]任何胆敢挑衅我的人 我会朝着他的脸开枪
[01:03.58]
[01:04.09]他们知道我是个恶魔 在路上干掉敌人 
[01:06.79]我全速前进 但我不想互相角逐
[01:09.60]年轻人闪亮登场 我戴着劳力士手表 尽情炫耀 
[01:12.37]大家赚到越来越多的钱 他们已经知道我们出人头地
[01:15.07]县监狱里子弹横飞 穿着圣罗兰的行头招摇过市
[01:17.51]
[01:18.04]与白人女孩纵享欢愉 身边的女孩可以媲美Britney和Minaj 
[01:19.86]//
[01:20.27]
[01:20.96]大杀四方 我们尽情狂欢
[01:22.38]昂首挺立 永远不会失败
[01:23.14]
[01:23.66]每次我打去电话 性感的妹子随叫随到
[01:25.87]//
[01:26.37]随身带着格洛克枪 保护好自己 我不会随意与她缠绵
[01:28.48]对天发誓 
[01:28.94]我在混乱的街区里享受盛宴 他们目无法纪 在这里为非作歹 
[01:31.14]怂货
[01:31.71]让我大发雷霆 我可能会骗人 我会睚眦必报
[01:33.98]//
[01:34.41]我脸上有纹身 但我对节奏布鲁斯音乐情有独钟
[01:36.80]//
[01:37.16]与几位空乘纵享欢愉 因为我坐着宽敞的私人飞机
[01:39.32]
[01:40.02]我还没有遇到一个我愿意不惜一切代价留在我身边的女人
[01:42.83]这一切太过深奥
[01:43.41]//
[01:43.87]我掌控自己的命运 我的脚上没有镣铐
[01:46.12]千真万确
[01:46.51]我知道他们偷拍照片 试图算计一个身经百战的人物
[01:48.86]卑鄙无耻
[01:49.33]我视野狭窄 需要望远镜看清远方 
[01:51.63]//
[01:52.03]带她去吃日式烧烤 她只想主动投怀送抱
[01:54.35]千真万确
[01:54.80]帮派冲到街角 有人停下脚步 被打得落花流水
[01:57.14]怂货
[01:57.59]耳朵上戴着钻石耳钉 度过愉悦的平安夜
[01:59.95]//
[02:00.40]你的妹子放荡不羁 你需要来自Steve的基因
[02:02.71]对天发誓 
[02:03.10]我的兄弟四处卖货 他说他的钱长在树上
[02:04.65]//
[02:04.98]我所做的一切 你根本不会明白
[02:07.62]你对我颐指气使 我今天可能会选择欺骗
[02:10.40]现在是20//年 所以我打算亲身示范 
[02:13.00]我一直精打细算 必须把我的钱存起来 
[02:15.47]
[02:16.38]穿着皮条编织的凉鞋 带着辣妹去吃日式烧烤 
[02:18.79]
[02:22.32]我身边的人都浑身珠光宝气 对那些带着偏见的人嗤之以鼻 
[02:24.46]
[02:27.69]随身带着两万五千块现金 飞到日本买几双筷子
[02:30.11]
[02:33.21]我和朋友在一起 数着钞票 我不会主动出击
